sph.vaadin.ui

Class ConfirmDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • Window
      • sph.vaadin.ui.ConfirmDialog
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuestionRemovalDialog

    public class ConfirmDialog
extends Window
    ConfirmDialog implements a simple dialog box for Vaadin environment.

    copyright © Ville-Video 2013

    Since:
    8.11.2013
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sami Holck, Juha Mäkilä

        public ConfirmDialog(String caption,
             String content,
             ConfirmDialog.Callback callback)
        Constructs a new dialog window with textual content.

        NOTE: Allows HTML content.

        Parameters:
        caption - the caption text of the dialog window.
        content - the content text of the dialog window.
        callback - the callback class for the dialog window.
